prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Julia Cooley Altrocchi Papers, 1940-1962, Accession # 10795, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: This collection was transferred from Rare Books on October 17, 1988.

did.unittitle: "Astronaut to Vega," a poem by Julia Cooley Altrocchi 1962 April

scopecontent.p: Winning poem in $100.00 Dramatic Monologue in Verse Contest, sponsored by the Browning Society of San Francisco.

did.unittitle: Julia Cooley Altrocchi, Berkeley, California, to "Barrett Collection, University of Virginia," 1962 October 8

scopecontent.p: Describes the material that was a gift to the Library.

did.unittitle: Julia Cooley Altrocchi at the time of the publication of The Old California Trail 1940

scopecontent.p: Includes books and articles containing references to her, awards, and publications of her work.
Including a brief biography and synopsis of her published works.

did.unittitle: Reading of "Astronaut to Vega" by Julia Cooley Altrocchi 1962 May 18

scopecontent.p: Read at the annual San Francisco Browning Society Dramatic Monologue in Verse Contest, open to all writers of the San Francisco Bay Counties, aired on KPFA Radio in Berkeley, California on June 18, 1962.
